评论概述: Tailored. The seams are sewn with care.
评论详情: The dress fit me perfectly. Size 10 fit the way a well thought out garment should fit. The fabric falls beautifully. The sleeves are flattering. The fabric pattern is classic. I love everything about this dress. I can wear it this spring, and next fall. Also, the dress seems practically new. Thank you again, Rent The Runway.
